mapper.select:
/* USE : MomsBatchMapper.selectStoreList */ SELECT tms.HQ_OFFICE_CD , tho.HQ_OFFICE_NM , tms.STORE_CD , tms.STORE_NM FROM TB_MS_STORE tms , TB_HQ_OFFICE tho WHERE tms.HQ_OFFICE_CD = tho.HQ_OFFICE_CD
AND tms.HQ_OFFICE_CD LIKE '%'||#{hqOfficeCd}||'%'
AND tho.HQ_OFFICE_NM LIKE '%'||#{hqOfficeNm}||'%'
AND tms.STORE_CD LIKE '%'||#{storeCd}||'%'
AND tms.STORE_NM LIKE '%'||#{storeNm}||'%'
ORDER BY tms.HQ_OFFICE_CD, tms.STORE_CD
